name: Poseidon: The Missing Infra for Building zkDApps
description:
In this workshop, we present Poseidon, the missing infra for building zkDApps on Ethereum. Poseidon provides three things: 1) composable ZKP primitives as smart contract so that DApp developers donâ€™t have to write ZKP circuits on their own. 2) DApp SDK that helps the DApp developers build ZKP proof generation on client side (e.g. browser). 3) ZK-ZK Aggregator that aggregates a batch of client generated proofs into a single proof so that the amortized ZKP verification cost (gas cost) can be greatly reduced.

The workshop will include talks about the architecture, demos of building zkDApps, and panel discussion about co-processor architecture.

Audience: People who are interested in ZK technology, Ethereum Developers that don't know too much about ZK but want to build zkDApps.
